attributes.action: UK Lorry Drivers safety at French Ferry Ports
attributes.additional_details: We desperately need our government to get involved & stop this situation with clandestines in France,  it's been going on too long now with no help whatsoever off our Government, it's getting to the point where Drivers are having bricks thrown at their trucks making them stop then they're getting assaulted severely,,, We Need It Sorting Before A Driver Gets Killed"...
